title: ☑️ Prevent workload from using the default namespace
description: The namespace default is a saved namespace value in which Kubernetes is deploying all objects without an explicit namespace. Using explicit namespaces instead of the default value makes for clearer boundaries between sets of pods in a cluster. For example, namespaces that represent teams present a clear organization of cluster resources and make configuration overlaps less likely.
